location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Commodore George Barnes Brucks, Commanding the Indian Naval Squadron in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter concerns a case of piracy committed at Debaye [Dubai], suspected of having been carried out by men associated with the fugitive Jubber Rugagree [Jassim bin Jaber Raqraqi]. Hennell requests that Brucks add an additional forty Crowns to the amount to be demanded from the Shaikh of Biddah, Salmin bin Nasir, as compensation for Rugragreeâ€™s activities.
